definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: Disclosed are a cotton picking and separating device and a pneumatic cotton picker.
sentences.chinese: 一種採棉分棉裝置和氣流式採棉機。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a cyclonic small cotton-picker.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是一種氣旋式小型採棉機。

sentences.english: Spinning Test & Analyses and Property of Machine Pick Up Cotton;
sentences.chinese: 採棉滾筒是水平摘錠式採棉機的核心部件。

sentences.english: Drum is the key component of level spindle-type cotton picker.
sentences.chinese: 採棉滾筒是水平摘錠式採棉機的核心部件。
